website_summaries.verdict: Tide to Go is designed to be kept handy so you can treat stains when they are still fresh.
pros: Slightly larger than a marker or pen
May make the stain disappear before you wash
Created for food and drink stains
Fits in a purse or briefcase
A good way to keep lighter colors looking fresh and unstained
cons: Sometimes the Tide to Go stick can have an unusual odor

customer_reviews.title: It's best to lightly rub the spot after treatment
customer_reviews.text: Initially assumed they were just overpriced soap sticks, but a little research revealed it's an effective mix of chemicals that work well together on just about any stain I've managed to impart into my clothing. It's best to lightly rub the spot after treatment, but that's not always necessary.
customer_reviews.author: James Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Decent stain remover expensive for size
customer_reviews.text: I like this for on the go. It works fairly well. But there is not much product for the price. Also if the outside of the pen gets wet, the orange color comes off on hands and potentially clothing if you don't realize it.
customer_reviews.author: Wangoose

customer_reviews.title: It's become an essential.
customer_reviews.text: Gets most stains out or at least makes them disappear enough to not be noticeable. I keep one in my purse at all times, another in my office desk drawer and one in the dining room buffet for quick treatment of tablecloth stains.
customer_reviews.author: Just my opinion

customer_reviews.title: Fix the tip
customer_reviews.text: The old tip on these worked better. Plastic is hard and so the liquid just goes straight on material and you can't just put a lot or a dot on. The old tip was softer and you could safely scrub. Why does everything seem to change but hardly ever for the better?! Plus, where are the ounces in these ads.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tide To Go sticks are perfect for travel
customer_reviews.text: I always travel with a Tide To Go stick. Can't tell you how many times I've handed a Tide stick to someone seated near me on a plane after they've spilled food or red wine on themselves....and they always say, what a good idea to have one of these in your carry-on! Of course I also use these at home, but I primarily buy these for travel.
customer_reviews.author: M. Fox

customer_reviews.title: I Love These Things!
customer_reviews.text: I love these stain removers and carry them with me most everywhere. They are in my car, my suitcase, my handbag... Perfect for removing a drop of wine or food.
customer_reviews.author: R. Surber

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't always work perfectly, but when you need it ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't always work perfectly, but when you need it, you need it. Also, the tide to go sometimes smells strongly, so be careful if using a lot of it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lay

customer_reviews.title: Cleans it right out quickly
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome to use for all people that just have issues with catching their food or drinks to the mouth area...;)
customer_reviews.author: sylvain limoges

customer_reviews.title: everyone should own one and have it at all times
customer_reviews.text: with the exception of magic eraser, this is the best product made today. i am messy and i spill and i always have one of these with me and they have saved many an article of clothing and even get out blood! (i had a bloody nose onto a mattress and it got it out) tmi? sorry. lol
customer_reviews.author: Justina

customer_reviews.title: They're a lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: The first time I bought one of these was at an airport after I had spilled coffee on my shorts. It was a lifesaver then and continues to be so! I've used it on coffee stains, maple syrup, jam, and wine and it has been awesome at getting them all out of my clothes. Keep one handy and stop worrying about spills!
customer_reviews.author: Mixologogue

customer_reviews.title: RECEIVE PRODUCT AS PICTURED
customer_reviews.text: PICTURED WAS A SINGLE TIDE PEN, I WANTED 6 PACKAGED TIDE PENS, RECEIVED A 2-3 PKS AND IT IS NON RETURNABLE? DID NOT RECEIVED WHAT WAS ADVERTISED.
customer_reviews.author: REXALL

customer_reviews.title: STAIN REMOVER
customer_reviews.text: THIS PRODUCT FUNCTIONS VERY WELL AND AT A REASONABLE COST. I WOULD DEFINITELY PURCHASE THIS ITEM IN THE FUTURE IF I HAD A NEED. I AM VERY HAPPY WITH THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: A lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a magnet for spots on my clothes..... I try to be so careful but it doesn't help. I carry one of these with me at all times and I have yet to come across a spot it can't get out! It's great stuff, give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Night ReaderTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: These save my life every day
customer_reviews.text: I eat a LOT and am always getting little particles on my shirts. Of course they're always oils that stain. Carrying a Tide Stick in my backpack with me has seriously saved all of my shirts. They're great.
customer_reviews.author: Bitey (the big one)

customer_reviews.title: I have been using it over three years
customer_reviews.text: I work at a restaurant and this is a must have item! There are certain food stains this product cannot erase(such as grease or chili oils) but other than that I have had so many little spots cleaned out through Tide to go! One will last at least a month or two!
customer_reviews.author: Raiden Ko

customer_reviews.title: Is a great product. Quality of product exceeds expectations
customer_reviews.text: Received order very quickly. It was packaged well. Is a great product. Quality of product exceeds expectations. Will definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Techiwoman

customer_reviews.title: Tide To Go Stain Remover - Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Tide to go works!! Spots away from home are a pain till found Tide To Go Use it then wash when you get home. Stain disappears before setting. Would highly recommend to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kelvin Runner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Present for your coworkers
customer_reviews.text: I can't tell you how many times I have been visited at my desk by coworkers asking if I had a Tide pen they could use. I decided to give them their own Tide pens for Christmas. All recipients were delighted.
customer_reviews.author: Tweediaflower

customer_reviews.title: Instant stain remover
customer_reviews.text: My husband wears white pinpoint oxford shirts and spills something on his shirt at lunch almost every day. With the instant stain remover he doesn't have to change shirts for the afternoon! I carry one in my purse and he carries one in his suit jacket!
customer_reviews.author: lnewber

customer_reviews.title: A must have if you have kids
customer_reviews.text: Great product and fast shipping I would recommend purchasing it.
customer_reviews.author: STEPHEN MARTIN

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff and carry it with me all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Gatoraunt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I can't live without these. Now I'm set for a while
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: When you are sloppy like me these Tide To Go's are a godsend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to carry.
customer_reviews.text: it didn't get all my stains out but it was okay when I needed something. It was nice to know I wouldn't have to wear a "lobster bib for all my meals.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Merrill Millwater

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: Very good, i used it on my child's cloth every time.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra1122

customer_reviews.title: Its good
customer_reviews.text: It is not one of the stain removers , which instantly gets rid of the stain. So when you spill over something over your t-shirt, you got to spill this TIDE STAIN REMOVER on it as well so it does make sure that your cloth wouldnt be clogged with STAIN but its not an immedieate relief solution.
customer_reviews.author: Sushil Premjani

customer_reviews.title: Tide Stain Sticks?
customer_reviews.text: The whole box was dry when I received them. They couldn't remove a single stain. I will never buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard B. Paris

customer_reviews.title: It's nice to get something immediately on a stain so as ...
customer_reviews.text: I find these stain more than actually helping. It's nice to get something immediately on a stain so as not to set - but I wouldn't want to continue to wear the garment in question because I feel like the pen actually draws more attention to the spill. Have tried it many different ways, pen directly on stain, pen to napkin to stain and non really seem to work for me. Like I said, good to get something on prewash but not good in my opinion for "on the go"
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy to find that I could buy these Tide To Go sticksin bulk! Although I use these sticks occasionally for stains on clothing (I always keep one in my purse) and they work very well, the biggest use I have found for these is to clean the white grout between the tile on my kitchen countertop. This grout looks stained and awful very quickly. I have tried everything (including bleach sticks), but this stain stick is the only thing that really works well. The harder tip of this stick is perfect for this purpose. All my house guests always comment on how new and clean my countertop looks.
customer_reviews.author: dd121

customer_reviews.title: Great for most stains
customer_reviews.text: I'd give it 5 stars but it does have a tough time on same of my shirts when I slop oil/grease on them...with those stains I have to hit them with another stain remover before laundering. Other than that, though, these little things are really awesome. I always keep on in my computer bag which is almost always with me...my wife keeps one in her purse..
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: Good Instant Stain Remover
customer_reviews.text: The Tide to Go Instant Stain Remover is pretty handy when you have an emergency situation on your clothing. It works great on Pen stains, not so much on the greasy, food oil type stains. Best is to use the laundry detergent right away, but in tight situations an Instant Stain Remover sometimes keeps the stain from sticking or clinging to your clothing. Removes: Soda, Ink, Coffee, Milk, Ice Cream and Orange Juice so far.. DOES NOT Removes: Any HIGH OIL TYPES like, Curry, Salad Dressing (sometimes), Chicken Stew etc.. Mainly, it will take out the stains but still lives a slight mark on the clothing..
customer_reviews.author: BigBert

customer_reviews.title: Great Stain Remover For Purse
customer_reviews.text: I bought a few of this to keep one at my house, at the car, at the office and always i have even another one in my purse. It takes off almost everything, it works really well. The size is like a pencil liquid paper and its very easy to use. The only reason i gave a 4 star is because after a while with it, the outside label of the pencil start to erase and it looks really old and ugly. Also, it cannot be stored with pressure around it because it can spill a little. But as a stain remover is great!
customer_reviews.author: NA

customer_reviews.title: Great pack for on the go cleaning
customer_reviews.text: Got it for the servers at my job and I got a hug from my crush Definitely worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Vicars

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: a must have in my purse for my accidents and those around me
customer_reviews.author: Pen Mo

customer_reviews.title: Handy and helpful
customer_reviews.text: I have received this item as a stocking stuffer and have purchased several myself- they are very useful in helping to avoid staining but you have to apply the product right away. Also, you have to try and blot the clothing so that you don't end up with a ring around where the stain was. I find it very helpful in cleaning stains (I stain a lot of clothing) and the tube is small and portable. Just make sure your expectations for its use are reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: JenF

customer_reviews.title: 6 pack of magic
customer_reviews.text: We all know what a miracle worker the Tide pen is, so I won't bemoan that point. This 6-pack is the best per-pen deal I was able to find on the internet. For those who value individual packaging, they arrive (or at least mine arrived) like this - see photo.

customer_reviews.title: These work right away!
customer_reviews.text: I never leave home without one in my briefcase and another (spare) in my suitcase. If you value your clothes, these are a must have... they really work and have, more than once, saved the day at a meeting or a dinner.
customer_reviews.author: W. K. Holmes

customer_reviews.title: What stain?
customer_reviews.text: These pens are amazing! I am constantly dropping food on expensive work shirts and ties. A co-worker always had a Tide pen that worked miracles. I finally bought some for myself off of amazon. The only downside is that the liquid in the pen stinks to high heaven... But, it gets out the stains! So I can't complain. Good price on Amazon too!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: IT REALLY WORKS
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 6-pack to have one in each car, at the office and a few spares. Wouldn't leave home without one in my shaving kit. This is an amazing product that works on numerous spills and dries within a minute or two without showing the stain. I do recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Larry E Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Great for removing stains
customer_reviews.text: These do a great job removing stains when they happen. What I like are that they are compact so I keep one in my car and carry one while traveling and remove stains almost immediately. What little stain may show through usually comes out in the wash later.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Kline

customer_reviews.title: Clothing Saver
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I find it takes out almost any fresh food stain. It's already saved several favorite items of clothing from the trash bin. It does take a bit of rubbing with the absorbent tip to remove tomato based stains, but remove them it does. I think those folks who have been disatisfied don't get that the tip is the key.
customer_reviews.author: R. Lea Campbell

customer_reviews.title: I love these
customer_reviews.text: Tide ToGo pens are the best! I bought a six-pack to give away at work (who doesn't get a coffee or pasta stain on their clothing), and to for vacation trips. These are indispensable when out of the house
customer_reviews.author: E. Chun

customer_reviews.title: Carry one of these with me all the time. ...
customer_reviews.text: Carry one of these with me all the time. Don't know how many garments it has saved from various types of potentially staining accidents. Have never had a problem with discoloration of clothing due to the application of the tide stick.
customer_reviews.author: Billy X

customer_reviews.title: Tide to go stick
customer_reviews.text: Tide to go is a great product. We buy six at a time and my wife keeps one in her purse, I have one in my desk and keep one in the car. Of course we keep one or two around the house. We use if a lot on our grandson. Very good product.
customer_reviews.author: D. McDougald

customer_reviews.title: How can you go wrong?
customer_reviews.text: 6 Tide to go pens? One in the office, one in the briefcase, one in the wifes purse... they come everywhere with us now! These things get rid of stains so quickly and painlessly, they are my favourite!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Crawford

customer_reviews.title: No longer comes in the packaging shown in the image
customer_reviews.text: After ordering this exact product (pack of 6 format) several times over the last 2 years, the order I received today came with each pen NOT individually packaged in its cardboard package as shown in the image. The image is therefore nw misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Imad Shawa

customer_reviews.title: This stuff actually works
customer_reviews.text: I always have a Tide to Go in my purse and in my home. It has some trouble with grease stains, but I've gotten red wine out of a white shirt at a work function and no one even noticed I'd spilled. Pretty amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't have believed if I haven't tried...
customer_reviews.text: Everyone elses' rave reviews on this product were quite impressive, so I decided to give it a try. I would not have believed it unless I tried, and IT WORKED! But don't take my word for it - try it and SEE for yourself! Remember, works wonders on "FRESH" stains. Don't let the stain sit on clothes too long.
customer_reviews.author: rhetse

customer_reviews.title: Tide to Go
customer_reviews.text: Can't believe this really works but it does. I have used it on new spills as well as old and like magic they were gone. I sent some to my 87 year old Mother. Good to carry one in your purse or pocket for accidents.
customer_reviews.author: J L

customer_reviews.title: Don't leave home without!
customer_reviews.text: We (my wife and I) carry these with us all of the time. They are a great product.
customer_reviews.author: KyGoods

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This product was well packaged and sold for a good price. I have not been able to find it at the local stores, so glad to see it here.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient to carry in the purse. For emergency is a most!
customer_reviews.author: Lula

customer_reviews.title: Tide Stain-out sticks
customer_reviews.text: Very Convenient, works on common spills. Like the 6pack, one for every vehicle and briefcase for those accidental spills on the job.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Thull

customer_reviews.title: Tide to Go - never fails!
customer_reviews.text: I keep the Tide to Go applicators in my purse, office desk and also in my car. I swear by them for quick stain removals!
customer_reviews.author: bddc

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: we used the product for the first time at dinner - spilled some food on myself, and since I carry the product in my handbag, I used it and it worked immediately. So far my experience with Tide to Go has been very positive.
customer_reviews.author: Harris Appreciator

product_meta.title: Tide To Go Instant Stain Remover 0.33 oz ( Pack of 6)
product_meta.description: Fights stains instantly with a quick swipe. Removes most everyday spills on fabric including coffee, ketchup, wine and more. Perfect for storing in suitcases, purses or cars. Application: Laundry Pretreatment; Applicable Material: Fabric; Chemical Compound: Sodium Sulfonates; Dirt Types: Food Stains; Grass Stains; Grease; Oil-Based Soil; Organic Matter; Water-Based Soil.
feature_bullets: Instantly removes many fresh food and drink stains.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
